ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New Bard Song Database on EQLizer
ygData.msgSnippet: Because it is.  Kunark items seem to be aimed at bringing melee classes up in power to match the ability of caster classes.  It s about time actually. With
ygData.messageBody:
Because it is. Kunark items seem to be aimed at bringing melee classes up
in power to match the ability of caster classes. It's about time actually.
With mobs quad popping, casting ae affects, having 32khp etc the melee
classes were becoming extinct. These new items were sorely needed in a
world where 7/23 was one of the best 1hs weapons available.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
----- Original Message -----
From: "Mike Roach" <Mike.Roach@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 23, 2000 1:36 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Bard Song Database on EQLizer


> 1-hs Damage 10 Delay 18 weight 0.8 with a proc? I think this might be
> bogus...why does all the Kunark loot seem like Monty Haul stuff?
>
> -Faras
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 23, 2000 11:12 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] New Bard Song Database on EQLizer
>
>
> EQLizer's new Bard Song Database has some interesting quirks.
>
> They show Mez's and Calms as if they did the same thing.
>
> They show Bombastic Bellow as a target Stun and Regen as if that was the
> intended effect and not just another example of Verant's "extensive"
testing
> failing to find the most basic bug.
>
> See what others can be found!
>
> Kit
>
> also check out the new 1HS they list that is bard specific, yikes I want
> one!
>
